Recommendations: 1. The syllabi may be enriched with varied strategies, teaching aids or equipment. They may also be signed, dated, and may follow a format acceptable to all.
2. The faculty core or not, may be encouraged to conduct their researches which results may be basis for better instruction.
3. There must be a measure to equalize the number of preparations assigned to teachers. A maximum of three preparations may be enough to assure quality instruction.

4. Only the documents to evidence the achievements, performances, activities and other pertinent matters supporting the program within the coverage period of evaluation may be packaged at the accreditation center.
